Type.BattleDialog: If you’re ready… I shall begin.
You had better not be fooled by a world shown at the hand of someone else.
I hope we will not bear ill feelings for each other over this.
Deceived… yet again.
You should not trust what your eyes see so easily.
Forgive me. I meant no malice.
I am fulfilling my obligations.
The goal seems to grow closer.
I am certain we will persevere if we try.
…We will have to keep faith until the end.
You may count on the remaining librarians to take care of the rest.
Don’t blame yourself, and rest easy.
It is ill-advised to be agitated. Be calm, and reclaim your breath.
We are all walking down a road on which we cannot turn back, I suppose.
You’re right, Hokma, sir… Is there any way to handle this?
I want to say I’m not upset… but I know better…
Is everyone else okay?
Don’t worry about me. I know what I’m capable of.
If we give up, that’s when it really ends…
I’m glad we could overcome this successfully.
I don’t think we can take him on in an ordinary way…
I’m sorry I couldn’t aid you further…
Have faith in myself… and move forward.
We should check ourselves from time to time.
The situation… I believe we can turn the tables anytime.
…It’s over for real this time, right?
We have to believe in that we can win…
What a… sly trick.
We’re almost there… Just a bit more…
Why did you have to act so rashly…!
I’m getting concerned… Think we can make it?
That was close… What would’ve happened if we failed to stop him?
Impatience will hurt us… I’ll get ready.
This won’t be good… at this rate…
We might want to concentrate more.
Showing… lies, huh.
He’s setting us up for a bad time… Watch out, everyone.
I can’t be sure about how much of this I can trust.
